EmailTemplate.name: 21_M1_HNW_Global-Express_Nurture.Email 2 from Perry
EmailTemplate.subject: Primus Elite Upgrade for Global Express
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you and your passengers ready to experience better flight performance and safety?
With Primus Elite we help you go from very old technology to new LCD’s for a clearer, better picture, and a more enjoyable flight experience for you and your passengers.
Here’s a short video <[[https://youtu.be/0RiXoma4jlI]]> where Chief Pilot, Joey Meier, talks about Primus Elite with Synthetic Vision.
Let's chat; my calendar below is up-to-date.
Take care,
Perry Pelitera Perry.Pelitera@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Perry.Pelitera@Honeywell.com]]> +1 602-245-5611 Let me know when you're available <[[mailto:perry.pelitera@honeywell.com?cc=lisa.watmore@honeywell.com&subject=Interested%20in%20more%20information&body=Hi%20Perry%2C%0D%0A%0D%0AI%20would%20like%20more%20information%20on%20the%20offerings%20related%20to%20Global-Series%20aircraft.%0D%0A]]>
